Reviews.Title: GE X% Power Pro Series 14.1Digital Camera 15X
Reviews.Author: Sebrena
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use, easy to handle, directions were easy to follow,pictures look great.Well worth the money spent. I would recommend it to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because I knew that it had capabilities that extended beyond those of a normal point and shoot camera. I wanted a camera with a manual mode that allowed me to change the shutter speed, apeture, and ISO of the camera. I also wanted all this with a price that was cheap. This camera fulfilled my expectations and takes quality photos.  Although it feels slightly cheaper, it works well for what I need.
